def calculate_minimum_ticket_cost(n: int) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the minimum cost of tickets needed to visit all schools.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The number of schools.

    Returns:
    int: The minimum cost of tickets needed to visit all schools.
    """
    n += 1
    return n // 2
